department.ch: 客家語文暨社會科學學系客家社會及政策碩士班
department.en: Master Program of Hakka Social and Policy Sciences

goal.ch: 本課程為客家語文碩士班和客家社會及政策碩士班的共同必修課，對客家語言,社會文化,政治經濟三方面提供鳥瞰式的介紹與研究指導。
goal.en: A required course for both Hakka MA programs, providing an introductory research guide for Hakka language, society and culture, and politics and economy.

outline.ch: 1-5周客家語文，6-10周社會文化，11-15周政治經濟，詳見各授課教師課程大綱
outline.en: see each instructor's syllabus and handouts

textbook.ch: 詳見各授課教師課程大綱
textbook.en: see each instructor's syllabus and handouts

flexDiscription.ch: 三位老師各上5周，其餘3周自修及撰寫報告
flexDiscription.en: 5 weeks of lecture for each instructor, and 3 weeks for self-study and writing term paper/report
